siteMetadata.title: Ribeiro Kishor Rajendran
siteMetadata.description: Ribeiro Kishor Rajendran is a Front End Developer specializing in building websites and always hungry to learn new tools and technologies.

responsibilities: Write modern and maintainable code for Warner Music Group Artist Website
Work with a variety of different languages, platforms, frameworks, and content management systems such as JavaScript, TypeScript, PHP, MySQL, Drupal, WordPress, Angular, React
Developing fan engaging real-time activation such as quiz, meme generators, etc.
Bug fixing and Enhancements in the existing website based on Agile methodology (Kanban board).
Deployment of code changes to Production.
